source_quote: if we're bullish for the day we want to be buying at the NY Midnight Opening Price or ideally below it

signature.condition: IF price shows accumulation (long positions building up) around the opening price in a bullish market
signature.action: THEN expect manipulation cycle after NY Midnight Opening Price with potential liquidity sweeps below opening price
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly describes accumulation phase as HTF bias establishment

source_quote: Market Makers will be actively looking to build short Liquidity meaning that if the price pushes quickly below an old low

signature.condition: IF price pushes quickly below an old low during NY session in bullish context
signature.action: THEN expect breakout traders' short stops to be taken before reversal (liquidity sweep)
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly describes this as entry trigger pattern

source_quote: price is going to break out above the previous high and they will see it as strength to buy while Smart Money will be looking to sell

signature.condition: IF price breaks above previous high during distribution phase
signature.action: THEN expect smart money to sell longs to breakout traders (distribution)
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly describes this as confirmation of distribution

source_quote: Building Long Liquidity after the Open to trap the Bullish Breakout Traders

signature.condition: IF in bearish context, price builds long liquidity after open
signature.action: THEN expect trap for bullish breakout traders followed by neutralizing short liquidity
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly describes this market structure formation

source_quote: Manipulation into Bullish PDA. Sell Stops Paired With Buy Interest

signature.condition: IF price shows manipulation into bullish PDA
signature.action: THEN look for pairing of sell stops with buy interest before upward expansion
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly describes premium/discount context for entries
